patthana23.58:4.1: Nasanidassanasappaṭigho naajjhatto dhammo anidassanaappaṭighassa ajjhattassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana23.58:4.3: Ārammaṇe cha, adhipatiyā cha, purejāte atthiyā avigate cha.
patthana23.58:5.1: Nasanidassanasappaṭigho nabahiddhā dhammo anidassanaappaṭighassa bahiddhā dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana23.58:5.3: Ārammaṇe cha, adhipatiyā cha, purejāte atthiyā avigate cha.
patthana23.58:6.1: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ naajjhattārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca anidassanaappaṭigho ajjhattārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana23.58:7.1: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ nabahiddhārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca anidassanaappaṭigho bahiddhārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana23.58:8.1: (Sahajātavārampi paccayavārampi nissayavārampi saṃsaṭṭhavārampi sampayuttavārampi pañhāvārampi vitthāretabbaṃ.)
